version_description:
Added Boss Battle in Stage 4:
• Fight Flippy in the Lost Mines!

New Friends System:
• Use Game Center, Facebook, or Username to add and battle friends

Revamped Cheating Handling:
• Crashes and Internet disconnects don't lose streak
• Multi-task timer extended so don't lose streak from accidental switching
• Battles are verified to prevent spoofing

Stability and Performance:
• Fix cart upgrades in events
• Remove ads fixed
• Chests achievement fixed
• Bug fixes and tweaks
